name: Rhythm Hythm
description: This is a simple rhythm game that i made for school. Click the arrows on time in sync with the beat to score points. At the end you will be given a results screen telling you how you did. All art assets made by me, in Piskel, except the background picture which was from Shutterstock and then made into pixels thanks to the mobile app Pixel Art. Music made by me thanks to the mobile app Music Maker JAM. Project made in Unity. Press any key to start the game.
